title: Passkeys list (response)
description: Retrieve the list of passkeys for the user.

created_at.description: The epoch date when the passkey was created.

id.description: The system id of the stored passkey.

last_used.description: The epoch timestamp that the key was last used to authenticate the user.

name.description: The descriptive name of the passkey.

passkey_id.description: The id of the passkey credential.

stored_on.description: The name of the device where the credential is stored on.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
